i cant recommend this game at full price  the graphics and ui are super but the ai breaks the game  did the devs even play the game  no matter how friendly the neighbors are they will war with you at the drop of a hat  nonaggression pacts are fake   the human player you will spend 100 your production and research effort towards a war goal regardless of which winning options you chose   the graphics are pretty though so the game makes a nice but expensive screensaver

this game would be ok if the ai wasnt so broken  the ai was being worked on by a 3rd party individual after the devs gave up on this game but the ai remains broken  ive never played a 4x game that had the ai flip flop so much so fast  the immersion is totally lost when they declare war on you one turn then want peace the next then offer a trade pact only to revoke it the next turn  diplomacy is pure garbage since the ai randomly decides to change their mind on a whim

the two issues ive had with the game are as followed war is the only way to win there are few actual factions so variety of matches are stunted some what otherwise it is a fun game that i have spent a lot of time playing

its an alpha centauri clone but with civ 5s engine or one very similar to it  i like it better than civ beyond earth  theres a bigger focus on armies and combat  harder difficulty levels are very challenging since the ai is so aggressive  also you can stack multiple combat units on the same tile  people complained about civ 5 and civ be for exactly this reason
so many confusing things about the combat system and the way units move that it makes the game completely unenjoyable and very frustrating
